name: Wrong Dimension - The 'One Dimensional' Platformer
description:
Wrong Dimension - The 'One Dimensional' Platformer

A game played entirely along a single line. Platform across a variety of levels that will put your determination, patience, skill, and reactions to the test. No spoken words, and no written instructions. Wrong Dimension has no language barriers, and expects the player to put the effort into exploring and learning this strange new style of gameplay.

This game will not hold your hand.

Created by Michael Troup, Mark Philip, and musician Joe Firth.

We are working on this game full time, so fixes and additions will be coming regularly. Available for Windows currently, we are working on an OSX version.

Wrong Dimension has passed Greenlight!

We love hearing from players, or prospective players! Feel free to email us at Contact@startupstudiogames.com and follow us on Twitter @StartUp_Studios.
